original_title: Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card 1995 Update "Wonderful World of Disney"
overview: In our last look at the Walt Disney’s Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card annual update, the VHS Cassette shipped to cardholders nationwide, it’s Update ’95 The Wonder World of Disney.  Walt Disney himself hosts this year MKC update, introducing Tinkerbell as our guide.  (leveraging footage from the 1958 An Adventure in the Magic Kingdom Wonderful World of Color television series)  Disneyland is celebrating its 40th Anniversary and Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card members save 10% on accommodations at the Disneyland hotel, and 15% on dining, not to mention discounted tickets to Disneyland Park.
title: Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card 1995 Update "Wonderful World of Disney"
